actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that corporations, labor organizations, and certain Government contractors which make unlawful political contributions shall be fined in an amount equal to the amount of such contributions.

summary.text: Provides that corporations, labor organizations, and specified Government contractors which make unlawful political contributions shall be fined in an amount equal to the amount of such contributions. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 610)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that corporations, labor organizations, and certain Government contractors which make unlawful political contributions shall be fined in an amount equal to the amount of such contributions.
